_meanings:
{@--1@} To pass or spring
over, traverse; {#niveSayamAsa#} 
{#vilaMGitADvA#} <ls>R. 5. 42</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 32</ls>; <ls>Śi. 12. 24</ls>,  
<ls n="Śi.">8. 26.</ls>

{@--2@} To violate, transgress, 
overstep, disregard, neglect; {#gatuM pravftte#}
{#samayaM vilaMDya#} <ls>Ku. 3. 25</ls>; <ls>R. 5. 48</ls>,
<ls>Ki. 2. 45</ls>, <ls>Śi. 17. 12.</ls>

{@--3@} To violate
the limits of propriety; <ls>R. 9. 74.</ls>

{@--4@} To rise towards, ascend or go
up to; <ls>Ki. 5. 1</ls>; <ls>N. 5. 2.</ls>
